question:
Which of the following are correctly matched with respect to the administration of Sher Shah Suri?
    Officer                     Duty
1. Shiqdar                military officer
2. Amil                     land revenue
3. Fotedar                treasurer
4. Karkuns               accountants
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Each sarkar of Sher Shah Suri was divided into several parganas. Shiqdar (military officer), Amil (land revenue), Fotedar (treasurer), and Karkuns (accountants) were the officers in charge of the administration of each pargana.
